actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to amend title VI of the Social Security Act to provide that an individual who is unable to care for his or her personal needs without assistance shall be eligible (as a disabled person) for the services of a homemaker and other service under the applicable State plan approved under such title.

summary.text: Changes title VI (relating to public health work) of the Social Security Act to provide that an individual who is unable to care for his or her personal needs without assistance shall be eligible (as a disabled person) for the services of a homemaker and other services under the applicable State plan approved under such title.

titles.title: A bill to amend title VI of the Social Security Act to provide that an individual who is unable to care for his or her personal needs without assistance shall be eligible (as a disabled person) for the services of a homemaker and other service under the applicable State plan approved under such title.
